amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-283 to exempt from the bill any State law requiring a person to be at least 21 years of age to possess or carry a concealed handgun.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 276 (Roll no. 848).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 276 (Roll no. 848).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Cohen.
